org.fruit.alayer

Interface State

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Widget>, java.io.Serializable, Taggable, Widget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StdState

    public interface State
extends Widget, java.lang.Iterable<Widget>
    A state describes an SUT's state. It includes the currently visible widgets which form a widget tree. Each of these widgets has properties like "Title", "Enabled", "Shape", ... which can be queried. However, states are not restricted to visual entities and can contain various kinds of additional data. A state forms a so called widget tree with the root node of that tree representing the system itself. For example
